text: While authenticating I'm getting this error even after updating the right redirect_url in the platform and code. Can anyone help me resolve this issue.
Did you update it in the app definition in your developer account in the app's Auth tab?  That is where it is looking for a match.
yeah there is a link rel="canonical" that points to the homepage
yes, that is updated in app's auth tab and in code as well, but still getting the same error
